dc_description_s: Relief represented pictorially.; "Abraham Goos sculpsit."; Oval vignettes of eight African cities on top of map. Includes illustrations of ten African people in traditional costumes along the sides of the map. Also included are illustrations of animals, birds, sea monsters, ships and historical notes.; Verso: Text describing Africa.|36 x 45 centimeters on sheet 44 x 54 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:27,000,000|General Map Collection
